channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP ERP (HCM Travel Management)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP ERP (HCM Travel Management)

item.title: CVE-2020-6301|2024-08-04T08:55:22.415Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20erp%20%28hcm%20travel%20management%29
item.description: SAP ERP (HCM Travel Management), versions - 600, 602, 603, 604, 605, 606, 607, 608, allows an authenticated but unauthorized attacker to read, modify and settle trips, resulting in escalation of privileges, due to Missing Authorization Check.
